name: Jon Snow the watcher
description: This app monitor google play website on certain id, send new reviews to slack channel

JON_SNOW_GOOGLE_PLAY_APP_ID.description: your app_id on Google Play (example: com.google.android.gm)

JON_SNOW_APP_STORE_APP_ID.description: your app id on App Store (example: '284882215' for https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/facebook/id284882215)

JON_SNOW_GOOGLE_PLAY_LOCATION.description: we currently only support two stores, zh-tw and en (Pull Request are welcome)

JON_SNOW_BOT_NAME.description: your bot name, default is Jon Snow the watcher
